aircraft.value: Vulture Heavy - AC-5159-713 at Base Charlie

defect_observed.value: Cargo hook release malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 18/07/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/07/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 22/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 24/07/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Cargo hook release malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
